results.title: American Honey
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
results.brief_description: A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.

constellations_other.name: Storyboards to Academy Awards
constellations_other.description: Storyboards allow filmmakers, showrunners and game designers to visualise and communicate how their stories will look on-screen.

results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
results.description: A teenage girl with nothing to lose joins a traveling magazine sales crew, and gets caught up in a whirlwind of hard partying, law bending and young love as she criss-crosses the Midwest with a band of misfits.

video_links.name: American Honey | Official Trailer HD | A24

results.title: American Experience
results.brief_description: TV’s most-watched history series brings to life the compelling stories from our past that inform our understanding of the world today.

constellations_other.name: Dial M for Media
constellations_other.description: Explores the nature of media use in high-profile cases as well as the ability of media to sway public minds.

results.description: TV’s most-watched history series brings to life the compelling stories from our past that inform our understanding of the world today.
description_for_label: TV’s most-watched history series brings to life the compelling stories from our past that inform our understanding of the world today.

video_links.name: American Experience: The Great War: Transformed

results.title: Alphaville
results.creator_credit: Filmstudio, Athos Films, Chaumiane, Jean-Luc Godard and André Michelin
results.brief_description: In his version of a futuristic dystopia, Jean-Luc Godard embraces a tech-noir aesthetic where human beings have become robotic slaves to technology, deprived of individuality and independent thought.

constellations_other.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_other.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Filmstudio, Athos Films, Chaumiane, Jean-Luc Godard and André Michelin
results.description: An American private-eye arrives in Alphaville, a futuristic city on another planet which is ruled by an evil scientist named Von Braun, who has outlawed love and self-expression.
description_for_label: An American private-eye arrives in Alphaville, a futuristic city on another planet which is ruled by an evil scientist named Von Braun, who has outlawed love and self-expression.

results.title: All This Mayhem
results.brief_description: A searing account of what happens when raw talent and extreme personalities collide. In this unflinching, never-before-seen account of drugs and the dark side of professional skateboarding, brothers Tas and Ben Pappas’ intense bond and charisma take them from the pinnacle of their sport into a spiraling world of self-destruction.

constellations_primary.name: Skate or die
constellations_primary.description: Skateboarding is a subculture frequently documented, from amateur skate videos filmed with fish-eye lenses, to documentaries exploring the genesis of the subculture and gritty feature films depicting underlying social dynamics.

results.description: A searing account of what happens when raw talent and extreme personalities collide. In this unflinching, never-before-seen account of drugs and the dark side of professional skateboarding, brothers Tas and Ben Pappas’ intense bond and charisma take them from the pinnacle of their sport into a spiraling world of self-destruction.
description_for_label: A searing account of what happens when raw talent and extreme personalities collide. In this unflinching, never-before-seen account of drugs and the dark side of professional skateboarding, brothers Tas and Ben Pappas’ intense bond and charisma take them from the pinnacle of their sport into a spiraling world of self-destruction.

results.title: All Saints
results.brief_description: All Saints is an Australian medical drama that first screened on the Seven Network. It was one of Australia’s highest rating dramas and also achieved popularity overseas in many countries.

constellations_other.name: Australian TV in the 1990s
constellations_other.description: In the 1990s, Australians and Australian culture was changing: so too were the representations of it on television.

results.description: Medical drama focusing on the working and personal lives of the doctors and nurses working on the front line of a busy inner city Emergency Department at All Saints Hospital.
description_for_label: Medical drama focusing on the working and personal lives of the doctors and nurses working on the front line of a busy inner city Emergency Department at All Saints Hospital.

results.title: All About Evil
results.brief_description: Deborah quickly cultivates a rabid legion of San Franciscan gore fans who help catapult her to new-found local celebrity.

constellations_other.name: Splicing history and silencing the lambs
constellations_other.description: With plastic strips coated with light-sensitive emulsions, film strips captured light and created moving pictures. In this Constellation we trace celluloid and splicing as plot device to serial killers, secrets agents and Super 8.

results.description: Deborah quickly cultivates a rabid legion of San Franciscan gore fans who help catapult her to new-found local celebrity— business booms so quickly, she’s forced to bring on a full film crew of like-minded misfits to meet the demand! Her adoring public, and even her biggest fan— high school student Steven— don’t realize that the murders in the movies are all too real. But will this brooding youth catch the blame as Deborah’s steady stream of ‘actors’ keep disappearing at an ever-quickening pace? What grisly fate awaits those that dare enter the Victoria theatre? Find out in ALL ABOUT EVIL!
description_for_label: Deborah quickly cultivates a rabid legion of San Franciscan gore fans who help catapult her to new-found local celebrity— business booms so quickly, she’s forced to bring on a full film crew of like-minded misfits to meet the demand! Her adoring public, and even her biggest fan— high school student Steven— don’t realize that the murders in the movies are all too real. But will this brooding youth catch the blame as Deborah’s steady stream of ‘actors’ keep disappearing at an ever-quickening pace? What grisly fate awaits those that dare enter the Victoria theatre? Find out in ALL ABOUT EVIL!

results.title: Aliens of the Deep
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Walden Media, James Cameron, Steven Quale and Andrew Wight
results.brief_description: James Cameron teams up with NASA scientists to explore the Mid-Ocean Ridge, a submerged chain of mountains that band the Earth and are home to some of the planet’s most unique life forms.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Walden Media, James Cameron, Steven Quale and Andrew Wight
results.description: James Cameron teams up with NASA scientists to explore the Mid-Ocean Ridge, a submerged chain of mountains that band the Earth and are home to some of the planet’s most unique life forms.

results.title: Aliens
results.creator_credit: Brandywine Productions, SLM Production Group, 20th Century Fox, David Giler, Gale Anne Hurd, James Cameron, Peter Lamont, Walter Hill and Emma Porteous
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986
results.brief_description: When Ripley’s lifepod is found by a salvage crew over 50 years later, she finds that terra-formers are on the very planet they found the alien species. When the company sends a family of colonists out to investigate her story—all contact is lost with the planet and colonists. They enlist Ripley and the colonial marines to return and search for answers.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

results.title: Alien: Covenant
results.creator_credit: Scott Free Productions, Brandywine Productions, TSG Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Chris Seagers, Mark Huffam, Michael Schaefer, John Logan, Janty Yates, Ridley Scott, Michael Green, Jack Paglen, David Giler, Walter Hill, Dante Harper and Michael Furniss
results.headline_credit: Australia, Canada, New Zealand, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2017
results.brief_description: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, the crew of the colony ship ‘Covenant’ discovers what is thought to be an uncharted paradise, but is actually a dark, dangerous world—which has a sole inhabitant: the ‘synthetic’, David, survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Scott Free Productions, Brandywine Productions, TSG Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, Chris Seagers, Mark Huffam, Michael Schaefer, John Logan, Janty Yates, Ridley Scott, Michael Green, Jack Paglen, David Giler, Walter Hill, Dante Harper and Michael Furniss

results.title: Alias
results.brief_description: Sydney Bristow, an agent who has been tricked to believe she is working for the U.S. government, is actually working for a criminal organization named the Alliance of Twelve. Upon learning this, Sydney becomes a double agent for the real CIA.

constellations_other.name: Splicing history and silencing the lambs
